article.author: AMResorts®
article.title: Safe Travels - Our world has changed. We have too.
article.lead: As AMResorts® prepares to welcome you back to their beautiful beachfront resorts, they are committed to redefining your travel journey with the best-in-class CleanComplete Verification™ practices.
article.body: While health and safety have always been their top priorities, these new protocols further elevate the standards of quality and cleanliness, enabling you to vacation at any AMResorts® property with the ultimate peace of mind.

article.author: Globus Family of Brands
article.title: Today We Dream, Tomorrow We Do
article.lead: Go ahead – update your bucket list, start an inspiration board, learn a few foreign phrases. After all, the sun is still rising over Uluru, the Amazon is still flowing through the rainforest, Mona Lisa is still smiling, and the Queen’s Guards aren’t.
article.body: As we get closer to the joyous day that the Globus Family of Brands can resume showing you the wonders of the world, keep dreaming, mapping, planning, and pinning. We certainly are.
article.embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/h6tftByL4x0?rel=0&showinfo=0" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; encrypted-media" allowfullscreen></iframe>
